summary.p: Sends books that [Hans] Vogler [the Younger] left behind, and wonders who will take care of his remaining possessions; has written to Vogler's father [Hans the Elder] regarding Vogler's debts. Inquires about the Imperial Diet [in Regensburg].

div.p: Greetings. Vogler left one book and another here; I am sending them with this. The container in which all his belongings are remains unclaimed; I wonder why this is so.
There are some very small debts, which I recently wrote to his father about, and I am very eager for them to be settled.
Farewell in the Lord with all your family. May 14th.
If you have any news from the Imperial Diet, please share it.
To his friend, Herr Heinrich Bullinger.
